title: Lottie Moss exudes glamour in a fitted little black dress at the re-opening of Louis Vuitton
text:
She's known for always looking her best when she steps out.

And Lottie Moss made sure to bring the glamour as she attended the re-opening of the Louis Vuitton New Bond Street Maison on Wednesday night.

The model, 21, showed off her sensational figure in a little black dress which featured a slit on the front and a plunging neckline.

Stylish: Lottie Moss, 21, showed off her sensational figure in a little black dress which featured a front slit at the re-opening of the Louis Vuitton New Bond Street Maison on Wednesday

Lottie flaunted her cleavage in the low cut dress and accessorised her look with a pair of simple heels with an ankle strap.

The younger sister of supermodel Kate Moss also toted a pink Louis Vuitton bag covered in stickers at the event to celebrate the occasion.

Keeping things stylish, Lottie styled her long sleek hair down and pushed it behind her shoulders for a few snaps in front of a multi-coloured background.

The blonde beauty kept her makeup simple for the evening out and opted for a neutral palette and pretty nude lipstick.

Glam: The model wore her sleek blonde locks down and toted a bright pink Louis Vuitton bag for the occasion

Lottie was joined at the event by Maisie Williams and her boyfriend Reuben Selby as well as Lady Amelia Windsor and actor Jason Momoa.

Arya Stark actress Maisie, 22, dazzled in a silver sequin embellished shirt dress with a dramatic gold-studded leather corset belt as she posed up a storm.

While Khal Drogo actor Jason, 40, looked sharp in a tan overcoat, which he paired with a black tee and jeans.

Taking the plunge: Lottie flaunted her cleavage in the low cut dress and accessorised her look with a pair of simple heels with an ankle strap

The outing came after it was revealed by MailOnline that Made In Chelsea lothario Jamie, 30, enjoyed a brief relationship with Lottie during a trip to Los Angeles last year – despite her being co-star Alex’s former girlfriend.

Mutual pals were left stunned when Jamie made the same mistake months later by starting a relationship with Sam Thompson’s ex Sophie 'Habbs' Habboo, 25, ultimately ending their friendship.

A source revealed to MailOnline: 'Jamie and Lottie got together during a trip to LA last year. Alex was extremely hurt when he found out – Jamie was supposed to be one of his best friends and it felt like the ultimate betrayal.'

Blonde bombshell! Keeping things stylish, Lottie styled her long sleek hair down framing her flawless features

Lottie was also close friends with Jamie's ex-girlfriend and former co-star Frankie Gaff, 25, prior to the fling, with the girls even living together.

After the relationship came to light among Chelsea circles, Lottie moved out of the flat they shared.

An insider added: 'To make things worse, Lottie was good friends and flatmates with Jamie’s ex Frankie Gaff.

'She tried to keep what happened with Jamie secret but ended up moving out of Frankie’s flat when it all came to light.'

Alex, 28, dated model Lottie for nine months before they split in 2018 over their busy work schedules.
description: Lottie Moss, 21, made sure to bring the glamour as she attended the re-opening of the Louis Vuitton New Bond Street Maison on Wednesday night.
